title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - Melbourne, Australia
description:
Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 in Melbourne 
Sponsor:Â realestate.com.au (http://www.realestate.com.au/) 
Address: 511 Church St, Richmond, VIC 3121 
Start: 8AM 
Registration open on Eventbrite (https://www.eventbrite.com.au/e/global-day-of-coderetreat-melbourne-2015-tickets-19056859580) 
https://www.eventbrite.com.au/e/global-day-of-coderetreat-melbourne-2015-tickets-19056859580 
The $10 deposit will be refunded when you arrive at the venue for the event. 
We made the tickets paid to minimise last minute cancellations & help us more accurately forecast the numbers. The tickets costs will be refunded (with an exception of $1.24 Eventbrite fee) to all who attend the event. If you have to cancel, we will refund the ticket cost if you notify us by at least one week prior to the event.
